TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AuthenticationService extends System.Object

summary.span: 允許使用 Web 服務存取 ASP.NET 表單驗證。

span.span: Enables access to ASP.NET forms authentication as a Web service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件可讓您透過 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 服務驗證使用者。The object enables you to authenticate users through a Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) service. 您必須驗證的使用者可透過 ASP.NET 成員資格從外部儲存的使用者認證的 Web 應用程式的應用程式時，您可以使用 WCF 驗證服務。You use the WCF authentication service when you must authenticate users through ASP.NET membership from an application that is outside the Web application that stores the user credentials. 應用程式必須能夠傳送及取用 SOAP 格式的訊息。The application must be able to send and consume message in the SOAP format. 透過類別，您可以記錄使用者、 記錄使用者 out、 驗證認證、 檢查驗證狀態、 自訂驗證，以及設定驗證 cookie。Through the class, you can log users in, log users out, validate credentials, check authentication status, customize authentication, and set the authentication cookie. 類別包含您應該只透過 WCF 服務存取的四種方法： ， ， ，和方法。The class contains four methods that you should access only through a WCF service: the , , , and methods. 若要呼叫這些方法，啟用網頁伺服器上的驗證服務，然後再連接到 Web 服務的 WCF 相容用戶端應用程式。To call these methods, you enable the authentication service on a Web server and then connect a WCF-compatible client application to the Web service. 如需有關如何設定驗證服務的資訊，請參閱[How to:啟用 WCF 驗證服務](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f7913259-762e-4a73-a771-ac9e42903f44)。For information about how to configure the authentication service, see [How to: Enable the WCF Authentication Service](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f7913259-762e-4a73-a771-ac9e42903f44). 若要登入的使用者，您會傳遞使用者認證，方法。To log users on, you pass the user credentials to the method. 如果認證有效，類別會建立驗證 cookie。If the credentials are valid, the class creates an authentication cookie. 如果驗證 cookie 不過期，就會知道已驗證使用者的認證，而您又沒有來再次驗證認證。If the authentication cookie has not expired, you know that the user's credentials have been authenticated and you do not have to validate the credentials again. (無 cookie 驗證不是可透過類別。)(Cookie-less authentication is not available through the class.) 可能會引發兩個事件︰和。The can raise two events: and . 正在驗證的使用者認證時，就會發生事件。The event occurs when the user credentials are being validated. 建立事件處理常式事件，以自訂方式會驗證使用者認證。Create an event handler for the event to customize how user credentials are validated. 之後已驗證使用者認證所設定的驗證 cookie 時，就會發生事件。The event occurs when the authentication cookie is being set after user credentials have been validated. 建立事件處理常式自訂驗證 cookie 的事件。Create an event handler for the event to customize the authentication cookie. 方法會檢查使用者認證進行驗證，但它不會傳回驗證票券。The method checks user credentials for authentication, but it does not return an authentication ticket. 使用當使用者先前已登入，您必須檢查認證是否仍然有效，在新的應用程式工作階段開始。Use when a user has previously logged in and you must check that the credentials are still valid at the start of a new application session. 如需使用主控台應用程式的 WCF 驗證服務的範例，請參閱[逐步解說：使用 ASP.NET 應用程式服務](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3f394f0-20d6-4361-aa8f-4b21bf4933eb)。For an example of using the WCF authentication service from a console application, see [Walkthrough: Using ASP.NET Application Services](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3f394f0-20d6-4361-aa8f-4b21bf4933eb).

related.span: Windows Communication Foundation 的驗證服務概觀

span.span: Windows Communication Foundation Authentication Service Overview

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared Custom Event Authenticating As EventHandler(Of AuthenticatingEventArgs)

summary.span: 會在驗證使用者認證時發生。

span.span: Occurs when user credentials are being validated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 正在驗證使用者認證時，會引發事件。The event is raised when user credentials are being validated. 建立事件處理常式事件，以自訂方式會驗證使用者認證。Create an event handler for the event to customize how user credentials are validated. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何繫結的事件處理常式中的事件`Application_Start`Global.asax 檔案的方法。The following example shows how to bind an event handler for the event in the `Application_Start` method of the Global.asax file. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Security.LoginService_MultipleCredentials#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.LoginService_MultipleCredentials/cs/Global.asax#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Security.LoginService_MultipleCredentials#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.LoginService_MultipleCredentials/vb/Global.asax#1)] 下列範例顯示的事件處理常式Global.asax 檔案中的事件。The following example shows an event handler for the event in the Global.asax file. 事件處理常式讀取兩個驗證值從屬性，並傳遞它們的使用者名稱和密碼的自訂驗證類別以及名為`StudentAuthentication`。The event handler reads two authentication values from the property and passes them together with the user name and password to a custom authentication class named `StudentAuthentication`. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Security.LoginService_MultipleCredentials#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.LoginService_MultipleCredentials/cs/Global.asax#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Security.LoginService_MultipleCredentials#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.LoginService_MultipleCredentials/vb/Global.asax#2)]

related.span: Windows Communication Foundation 的驗證服務概觀

span.span: Windows Communication Foundation Authentication Service Overview

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared Custom Event CreatingCookie As EventHandler(Of CreatingCookieEventArgs)

summary.span: 會在設定驗證 Cookie 時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the authentication cookie is being set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 之後已驗證使用者認證所設定的驗證 cookie 時，會引發事件。The event is raised when the authentication cookie is being set after user credentials have been validated. 建立事件處理常式自訂驗證 cookie 的事件。Create an event handler for the event to customize the authentication cookie. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何繫結的事件處理常式中的事件`Application_Start`Global.asax 檔案的方法。The following example shows how to bind an event handler to the event in the `Application_Start` method of the Global.asax file. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Security.LoginService.CreatingCookieEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.LoginService.CreatingCookieEventArgs/cs/Global.asax#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Security.LoginService.CreatingCookieEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.LoginService.CreatingCookieEventArgs/vb/Global.asax#1)] 下列範例顯示的事件處理常式Global.asax 檔案中的事件。The following example shows an event handler for the event in the Global.asax file. 事件處理常式中的值，加自訂驗證 cookie屬性設屬性。The event handler customizes the authentication cookie by adding the value in the property to the property. 存放區在 cookie 中只有您知道屬性中的資料不是機密的屬性。Store the property in a cookie only if you know that the data in the property is not sensitive. 惡意使用者可以存取 cookie 中的值。Malicious users can access the values in the cookie. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Security.LoginService.CreatingCookieEventArgs#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.LoginService.CreatingCookieEventArgs/cs/Global.asax#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Security.LoginService.CreatingCookieEventArgs#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.LoginService.CreatingCookieEventArgs/vb/Global.asax#2)]

related.span: Windows Communication Foundation 的驗證服務概觀

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool IsLoggedIn() cil managed

summary.span: 判斷目前的使用者是否已驗證。

span.span: Determines whether the current user is authenticated.

returns.span: 如果使用者已經驗證，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the user has been authenticated; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會檢查目前使用者是否經過檢查.property。The method checks whether the current user is authenticated by checking the .property. > [!NOTE] > 請勿呼叫從 Web 伺服器執行的程式碼的方法。Do not call the method from code that is executing on the Web server. 您呼叫只為一部分的 WCF 服務的方法。You call the method only as part of a WCF service.

related.span: Windows Communication Foundation 的驗證服務概觀

span.span: Windows Communication Foundation Authentication Service Overview

MemberSignature.Value: public bool Login (string username, string password, string customCredential, bool isPersistent);
.method public hidebysig instance bool Login(string username, string password, string customCredential, bool isPersistent) cil managed
Public Function Login (username As String, password As String, customCredential As String, isPersistent As Boolean) As Boolean
public: bool Login(System::String ^ username, System::String ^ password, System::String ^ customCredential, bool isPersistent);
member this.Login : string * string * string * bool -> bool

span.span: The user name to be validated.
The password for the specified user.

param.name: customCredential
param.span: 除了 和 以外要驗證的值 (如果有的話)。

span.span: The value or values to validate in addition to and , if any.

param.name: isPersistent
param.span: 值，表示驗證票證在工作階段之間是否仍有效。

span.span: A value that indicates whether the authentication ticket remains valid across sessions.

summary.span: 檢查使用者認證，如果認證有效，則建立驗證票證 (Cookie)。

span.span: Checks user credentials and creates an authentication ticket (cookie) if the credentials are valid.

returns.span: 如果使用者認證有效則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if user credentials are valid; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會驗證使用者認證，透過成員資格提供者。The method validates user credentials through a membership provider. 您可以使用預設的成員資格提供者，或在執行階段指定自訂成員資格提供者。You can use the default membership provider or specify a custom membership provider at run time. 類別傳遞`userName`並`password`到成員資格提供者方法，但不會通過`customCredential`。The class passes `userName` and `password` to the membership provider's method, but does not pass `customCredential`. 如果會傳回`true`，建立驗證票證來當做 cookie。If returns `true`, creates an authentication ticket as a cookie. 設定`isPersistent`參數來`true`建立驗證票證的持續時間超過目前的工作階段。Set the `isPersistent` parameter to `true` to create an authentication ticket that lasts beyond the current session. > [!NOTE] > 請一律使用安全通訊端層 (SSL，藉由使用 HTTPS) 以及驗證服務來保護機密資料。Always use the authentication service together with the secure sockets layer (SSL, by using HTTPS) to protect sensitive data. 方法會引發事件和事件。The method raises the event and the event. 建立事件處理常式自訂驗證，例如檢查的值`customCredential`或驗證透過非預設的成員資格提供者的認證。Create an event handler for to customize authentication, such as checking the values in `customCredential` or validating credentials through a non-default membership provider. 中的值`customCredential`不會驗證預設的成員資格提供者。The values in `customCredential` are not validated by the default membership provider. 若要自訂驗證 cookie，建立事件處理常式。To customize the authentication cookie, create an event handler for . > [!NOTE] > 請勿呼叫從 Web 伺服器執行的程式碼的方法。Do not call the method from code that is executing on the Web server. 您呼叫只為一部分的 WCF 服務的方法。You call the method only as part of a WCF service. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET 驗證](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fc10b0ef-4ce4-4a7f-9174-886325221ee1(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET Authentication](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fc10b0ef-4ce4-4a7f-9174-886325221ee1(v=vs.100)).

span.span: or is .

span.span: Windows Communication Foundation Authentication Service Overview

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Logout() cil managed

summary.span: 清除瀏覽器中的驗證票證 (Cookie)。

span.span: Clears the authentication ticket (cookie) in the browser.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會清除瀏覽器的 cookie 集合中的驗證 cookie。The method clears the authentication cookie from the browser's cookie collection. 使用者必須登入一次進行驗證。The user must log in again to be authenticated. 類別不會儲存有關的驗證票證已清除的伺服器上的資訊。The class does not store information on the server about which authentication tickets have been cleared. > [!NOTE] > 請勿呼叫從 Web 伺服器執行的程式碼的方法。Do not call the method from code that is executing on the Web server. 您呼叫只為一部分的 WCF 服務的方法。You call the method only as part of a WCF service. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET 驗證](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fc10b0ef-4ce4-4a7f-9174-886325221ee1(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET Authentication](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fc10b0ef-4ce4-4a7f-9174-886325221ee1(v=vs.100)).

related.span: Windows Communication Foundation 的驗證服務概觀

span.span: Windows Communication Foundation Authentication Service Overview

MemberSignature.Value: public bool ValidateUser (string username, string password, string customCredential);
.method public hidebysig instance bool ValidateUser(string username, string password, string customCredential) cil managed
Public Function ValidateUser (username As String, password As String, customCredential As String) As Boolean
public: bool ValidateUser(System::String ^ username, System::String ^ password, System::String ^ customCredential);
member this.ValidateUser : string * string * string -> bool

span.span: The user name to be validated.
The password for the specified user.

param.name: customCredential
param.span: 除了 和 以外要驗證的值 (如果有的話)。

span.span: The value or values to validate in addition to and , if any.

summary.span: 驗證使用者認證，但不會發出驗證票證。

span.span: Authenticates user credentials without issuing an authentication ticket.

returns.span: 如果使用者認證有效則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the user credentials are valid; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會驗證使用者認證，但未設定的驗證 cookie。The method authenticates the user credentials but does not set an authentication cookie. 而不需要驗證 cookie，使用者將不會記錄即使認證有效。Without an authentication cookie, the user will not be logged in even if the credentials are valid. 使用方法時您必須檢查使用者的認證是否有效，而不會收到的驗證 cookie。Use the method when you must check whether a user's credentials are valid without receiving an authentication cookie. 例如，您可能會執行這項操作如果驗證 cookie 儲存在用戶端應用程式，但您想要驗證使用者的認證仍然有效，新的工作階段啟動時。For example, you might do this if the authentication cookie is already stored in a client application but you want to verify that the user's credentials are still valid when a new session starts. 方法會引發事件，但不會引發事件。The method raises the event, but does not raise the event. > [!NOTE] > 請勿呼叫從 Web 伺服器執行的程式碼的方法。Do not call the method from code that is executing on the Web server. 您呼叫只為一部分的 WCF 服務的方法。You call the method only as part of a WCF service. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET 驗證](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fc10b0ef-4ce4-4a7f-9174-886325221ee1(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET Authentication](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fc10b0ef-4ce4-4a7f-9174-886325221ee1(v=vs.100)).

span.span: or is .
